headline: Northern Oil and Gas Declares Dividend, Plans 10% Hike in 2025
summary: NOG remains committed to shareholder value by boosting dividends to 42 cents per share with plans for a 10% annual increase in 2025.

headline: IYE: Energy Stocks Rallying Despite Weak Oil Prices, Cheap Valuation
